data.title: Robert George Fox
data.meta_description: Robert George Fox, Singer/songwriter/guitarist with eclectic taste. 50% covers. A member of the 'Musical Acts' category at Gig Heaven.
data.text:
I cover artists like - Bob Marley, EricClapton, The Kinks, Oasis, John Denver, Dean Martin, The Eagles, David Bowie, The Band. The Temptations, The Beatles, James Brown. I also cover some traditional folk songs too. My own material mirrors the artists I cover. My singing voice has been likened to Richard Hawley so if you can imagine Richard covering The Streets of London done in a reggae style, that's me. I am self-sufficient, with my own PA etc and I'm happy to travel in Europe and Scandinavia with my own vehicle. Any further and I would fly with guitar and effects pedalboard.

I have played in bands and I have my own backline, should the need arise. I have recorded a couple of my own songs with a top producer, of which I am very proud.

Thank you.
